reviews.review: I've grown up watching Marvel movies, and this was truly what I've been waiting for for so many years. The complexity of characters explored, and the all around awesomeness of the cast, including Marvel's best villain by far, makes this a movie for the ages.

Probably one of the worst Marvel movies made to sate.  So many plot holes.  It felt like half a movie artificially stretched out with lots of pointless scenes of people talking to each other.

Characters betray their core beliefs just for the convenience of the ending they wanted.

I will certainly NOT be seeing avengers 4 after this mess.
Lots of fun. Not perfect. But fun enough to look past its shortcomings.

Marvel does the impossible and makes a thrilling film that features countless heroes and manages to give them all a moment to shine. And at the same time, it surprises you, it shocks you, and it creates a compelling and threatening villain in Thanos. It manages to balance not only an insane number of characters but a myriad of tones, giving us the fun of Marvel, while also being the darkest movie in the Marvel Cinematic Universe.
Avengers: Infinity War is truly Marvel's Lord of the Rings. It makes me wish that there were 3 parts to the saga... who knows, maybe they can split Avengers 4 into 2 films. 
Amazing movie.
was never bored for one minute watching this movie

You can't judge this movie on its own. If you've been watching all of the MCU films in order, you'll understand, and cherish it a lot better. Then, and only then, will you appreciate it at its best. 
Millions of fans don't lie, no matter what the " critics " say. This film is the best film in its genre that I've ever seen.

This movie was so freakin awesome, I'm stunned at how big & extravagant this movie felt, it literally felt like I was watching a dream unfold. I mean, I couldn't believe how they could put so many fantastical things that before, I wouldn't of even thought possible in a live action movie. I'm pretty easily satisfied, but I think this movie is a perfect 10/10, & an excellent once in a lifetime masterpiece!! You must go see this movie!! An 84% is an INSULT in my opinion!! A roller coaster of a movie certainly, breathless excitement. No spoilers, so will keep it brief!
